text: AFAICS, this seems to be a bug with JavaDoc itself... It works if you replace any of the occurrences listed below with something like java.lang.String... At least on MacOS/X version of the JDK (had the same problem with the WebApp module classes).
creator: pier@betaversion.org
craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
text: Will be cleaned up when the build process is updated to Ant 1.4.

At this point, I don't think any additional updates to the 4.0 API classes are 
planned.
creator: remm@apache.org
